Not Ranveer Singh, But Randeep Hooda Was The First Choice To Play Kapil Dev In '83'
Ranveer Singh is all geared up for the release of Kabir Khan's next directorial venture '83'. The film is currently in news for its actors and the preparation that the entire team is undergoing.
But there is an interesting revelation about the film. According to a Pinkvilla report, the film was earlier going to be directed by Sanjay Pooran Singh, instead of Kabir Khan. Earlier, Sanjay wanted to cast actor Randeep Hooda to play the role of Kapil Dev. Randeep Hooda's look test was done and the actor was finalised.
A source was quoted in the report as saying,
Twitter
“Before Ranveer Singh, the role was offered to actor Randeep Hooda. This was when the film was to be directed by Sanjay Pooran Singh. This was formally announced and the look test was done too. But due to some circumstances, the project went into the hands of Kabir Khan and Ranveer bagged the role."

The film will be based on the Indian cricket team’s world cup victory in 1983 and Ranveer, including his entire team of actors are being trained under Kapil Dev for the film.
